summary: A very simple mod that stops NPCs from saying things like "You should really be more careful with the spells you cast." altogether.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b630/Matthiaswagg/DSCRLogo_zpsc82c028a.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=4]What Is It?[/size]

[size=3]Dangerous Spell Comments Removed (or DSCR for short) is an incredibly simple mod that removes comments like "That spell looks dangerous... Keep your distance." altogether. That's it. It's a single .esp, with the only requirements being the most up to date version of Skyrim.

[/size][size=4]Installation[/size]

[size=3]If you're using a Mod Manager, just install it with your mod manager and activate it.[/size]

[size=3]Manually, download the archive, and then extract or copy the contents to your Skyrim/Data folder. Then check DSCR.esp in your launcher.[/size]

[size=4]Uninstallation[/size]

[size=3]If you're using a Mod Manager, just deactivate DSCR.[/size]

[size=3]Manually, delete DSCR.esp from Skyrim/Data.[/size]

[color=#980000][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4995004/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Other Mods[/url][/size][/color][/center]
author: Mattiewagg
